text: Greg Mullavey (born Gregory Thomas Mulleavy Jr.; September 10, 1939) is an American actor. He was best known for his role as Tom Hartman on the television series Mary Hartman, Mary Hartman and Carly's grandfather in iCarly. He was born in Buffalo, New York. ==Other websites== * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Buffalo, New York
title: Greg Mullavey
